ygData.subject: Rising from the depths

Subject: Rising from the depths
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=180614363; y=f8oqF5yqKhmwn-4DCW5lEdJajlKrwhdwpk3scG2xDbhiqJ0ZOWj0mw

Deep under the earth, in a cavern a small shelter of a
room sits. The room looks like it may have at one time
been a workshop of sorts, but now it is a ruined mess.
Computers that have been apparently dead for millennia
upon millennia and half built machines line the
rough-hewn stonewalls. Nothing moves here, not
insects, rodents or even air. 

Suddenly the room begins to shake, as somewhere in the
distance an earthquake makes itself felt! Walls shake
and stones fall; dust for the first time in many years
is thrown into the air. Walls crack and shatter as a
crevice opens up, and somehow, from nearly a mile up
light streams into the room, the light shimmers, the
walls again rumble for a few minutes and then water
splashes into the chamber and quickly fills it!

The water entering the room washes away years of dust,
rock and layers debris, revealing a stasis pod. Inside
a form can be seen, dormant, as if waiting for
something and yet so far nothing has come. But with
the water comes silt, stone and salt, and and sparks
flash out, and circuits that�s have been long separate
by mere inches are now connected and the pod flickers
once ... twice ... and then comes online. 

     From the top of the lamps come on and light fill
the room with a murky glow. Inside the pod coded
instructions file across small screens. Images of
animals appear: an avian, a bovine, and a large jungle
cat, and the last almost forms an animal, but as if
due to some bit of damage it becomes a star fighter,
resetting to some default mode. Interior programming
of the pod continues processing information and
pouring it into the form as the machine shocks the
occupant and begins to awaken the 6-changer it has
stored inside. Its forms are modified to fit the
programming specifications: Shark, Eagle, Auroch
(large bull), Lion and star-fighter, all of them
varying hues of dark purple and black. The computer
switches off, and the interior of the stasis chamber
goes dark. 

A few moments pass, and then the door to the stasis
bubbles and opens, and what appears to be a large
black shark swims out of the chamber, moves swiftly
through the open crevice and swiftly rises to the
surface. Breaking into the air it shifts into the form
of a star fighter and hovers for a moment as if
looking around, The world it sees is strange and new,
its like a babe seeing the world for the first time.
The ship banks around the rather large lake that this
creature has risen from and notes structures of
habitation in the distance. 

�Megatron.� A deep reverberous voice speaks across
encrypted and yet ancient (Last season of BW) Predecon
channels. �It is time that I begin my duties. What are
your orders?� With a flare of boosters it rockets out
across the open skies in the direction of the original
Predecon base.
